text: The 2017 European Talent Cup was the first season of the European Talent Cup. Participants born between 2000 and 2004 rode a Honda NSF250R. ==Calendar== The following races were scheduled to take place in 2017. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- ! Round ! Date !
